page.title: 19NEWSAGENTS/PAPERS, PRESTON
page.content: {SURVEY OF NEWSPAPERS in Four Newsagent's Near St.Leonard's School, (Block 8), Walton-Le-Dale. { {WEEKDAYS Most popular morning paper: DAILY MIRROR ------- 3/4 shops Least popular morning paper: THE TIMES----------- 3/4 shops Evening paper-only type sold: LANCASHIRE EVENING POST-- 4/4 shops {SUNDAYS} Most popular:NEWS O T WORLD- 3/4 shops Least popular: SUNDAY MAIL-- 2/4 shops {MAGAZINES} Most popular _ Children's: LOOK IN ----- 4/4 shops Most popular _ Teenager's: SMASH HITS -- 3/4 shops Most popular _ Adult's: WOMAN ------- 3/4 shops
